content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "fire_coral", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 36, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft polished andesite, I need to move 4 andesite to the crafting grid, therefore I will start by moving 1 andesite from slot 14 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 3, "index": 14}, {"type": "fire_coral", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 36, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft polished andesite, I need to move 4 andesite to the crafting grid, therefore I will move another andesite from slot 14 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "fire_coral", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 36, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft polished andesite, I need to move 4 andesite to the crafting grid, therefore I will move another andesite from slot 14 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fire_coral", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 36, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft polished andesite, I need to move 4 andesite to the crafting grid, therefore I will move another andesite from slot 14 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_andesite
inventory=[{"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "fire_coral", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 36, "index": 38}]
thought: Now I can craft the polished andesite by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
